name: The Blocks Shoot At You
description:
Break blocks and get shot at in this chaotic cross of bullet hell and brick breaker. Bounce a ball and dodge projectile patterns that spawn whenever you break a block, while controlling the ball and using abilities to clear levels.



Gameplay Modes:
  • Levels: Play through a number of challenging levels

  • Endless Mode: See how long you can last in this mode of infinitely spawning blocks
